name: Dreamare
description:
Hello everyone, this is my 5th ludum dare. This time I made a tiny uncomfortable experience about anxiety and nightmares.

"Adam works in a busy office at the center of a big city. He suffers from anxiety and stress in times of  hard work. At night he dreams about wandering in his house, and every 10 seconds a particular event occurs.

Can Adam explore his dream fully before the external events wake him up?"

You can use the WASD or Arrow to move Adam and Space for action. (I included a partial support for Joystick)

After the dream bar is filled up, you will wake up. Do the actions and explore the dream!

Some things to add:

  • you can interact with some furniture.
  • doors, alarm clocks, telephones can silence the rings

Enjoy.

Credits:

Assets by LimeZu (https://limezu.itch.io/)

Font by jeti (https://fontenddev.com/fonts/enter-command/)
